oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ragin Cajus Wear Red Every Friday
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sports; Football
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (red, black and grey on white) Hatch poster announcing the Ragin' Cajuns Wear Red every Friday. Louisiana at Lafayette Ragin' Cajuns football program is a college football team that represents the University of Louisiana at Lafayette in the Sun Belt Conference.
